Name: Dendro Crystalfly
Desc: Pure elemental life-forms composed of drifting Dendro particles, as free and unbound as the butterflies they resemble.\nA glittering Dendro creature that is the product of rising and condensing elements, and which feeds off the ubiquitous power of Dendro.\nThey say that Dendro Crystalflies are the seeds of life. No matter how many times life withers, the earth will give birth to life anew, so long as the seeds do not die.
